profile_summary: Highly skilled Software Engineer with a strong focus on Account Lifecycle and Access Management (IAM). Proficient in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, and cloud technologies, particularly **AWS**. Demonstrated expertise in **SQL** and **NoSQL** databases, as well as infrastructure management using **Terraform** and **Kubernetes**. Knowledgeable in security protocols including **OAuth**, **OpenID Connect**, **SAML 2.0**, **SCIM**, and identity management principles such as **RBAC**, **ABAC**, and **ReBAC**. With over 10 years of experience, I have a proven ability to design and implement REST APIs and manage data with **JSON**, while effectively communicating complex technical concepts and solving intricate problems. My background includes significant contributions to projects within top-tier organizations, demonstrating an ability to create scalable, high-performing solutions.
